item.title: I’ve got 99 Failure Modes, Yours is Just One
item.dc:creator: Brian Brazil
item.description: When running a production system there's an endless stream of issues that have the potential to cause you significant hassle. How should you deal with this? The list of potential ways your production system can come tumbling down is endless: lightning strike, coffee spill, running out of file descriptors, security vulnerability of the day, newÂ behaviour […]
